column4: Hi, I wonder if there is a net installer for ubuntu or if it is possible to install from another partition. My cd-reader is not working as it should
Hi, I am having trouble booting with the breezy kernel. It is freezing when loading the hotplug subsystem. Is it possible to disable this on boot?
the hotplug subsystem is pretty important, not sure you would function properly without it
I guess it is. But, there might be some way to not load certain parts on boot, s.a. soundcard.
